Header: Year 5 Scholarship Examination will be held tomorrow
Content: The year 5 Scholarship Examination will be held tomorrow. Commissioner General of Examinations Sanath Pujitha said that all measures are in place to conduct the examination. Minister Akila Viraj Kariyawasam has extended his best wishes to the students who are sitting for the year 5 scholarship examination and the G.C.E. Advanced Level Examination. In his message, the Minister points out that an examination is an evaluation process which measures the knowledge of the students. It also states that an examination tests time management, efficiency, confidence to overcome challenges and the memory power.
